Articles.Content:
I really enjoy the game, but lately I haven't been feeling motivated to try anything... I'm pretty competent in my skills/ability to visit the various celestial bodies and don't really have any interest in using mods (except maybe kethane?) I've played most of Bio's campaign missions but even still I'm getting bored again.

That's where YOU come in. I've been doing streaming for various games and KSP is no exception. I want to start a series of "community request" missions that come from the forums, for the forums. I'll try just about anything you guys can come up with, weather you're new and need an explanation of a plane change, or experienced and want to tell me that you don't think I can land ON jool without using quicksave. Keep in mind I plan to keep my installation completely stock with the possible exception of kethane mod in the future.

Hit me with your best shot.
make a rocket that can get to all planets and moons and get back to kerbin.

^ Even though that is pretty much impossible it would be very cool.

Maybe a craft that does a fly-by of Eve to Moho and then dives into the Sun
